Name: Baneful Bunker
Effect: Target Self. Reaction 4. Shield Move. Reduce 3 Damage the User would receive from a Damaging Move. *If the Foe used a Non-Ranged Physical Move against the user, Poison the foe.
Description: The user encloses itself inside its sturdy shell, which is covered by poisonous barbs. If a barb pinches the foe's skin the wound will start to fester.
